location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '33'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a well at Bushire. An ox at left draws on a rope that is presumably pulling water up from the depths. A man stands behind the ox.At left a band of faded area in the image has been sketched in with graphite pencil.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Bushire.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘33’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Feb. 1918)’
